Did you know that, in the United States, African American women have 32% of abortions [Facts on Induced Abortion in the United States, Footnote 7, Guttmacher Institute] even though African Americans only make up 13% of the total population [2001, US Census Beaureau]?
 
 Discuss.

African American women have more abortions because their economic and social situation is more precarious than other sorts of women.
 
 If they made more money and exercised more power, they wouldn't have as many abortions.

African American women have more abortions because their economic and social situation is more precarious than other sorts of women.
 
 If they made more money and exercised more power, they wouldn't have as many abortions.

 
 Interesting observation, though I will give some more data from the study that specifically speaks to the issue you raised.
 
 It turns out that at income levels that are 300% (and higher) of the federal poverty line (that is, incomes that are greater than or equal to 3 times that of the income that one is considered to be living in poverty), African American women still have 2-3 times more abortions than Caucasian or Hispanic women.
 
 If this doesn't make sense, I'll try to explain it better.
It all depends upon how one defines the term "poverty level."

It all depends upon how one defines the term "poverty level."

 
 The line is the same across the spectrum. In other words, "poverty level" is being defined the same way across the racial spectrum of Caucasian, African American, and Hispanic.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Did you know?
